title: Sourou Sport de Tougan
text:
Sourou Sport is a <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkinabé</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Tougan">Tougan</a>, <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkina Faso</a>. The team was founded in 1954 and play in the Burkinabé Second Division.
Stadium.
Currently the team plays at the 2000 capacity Stade Sangoulé-Lamizana.
